lead_paragraph: New York's attorney general sued Donald Trump for $40 million Saturday, saying the real estate mogul helped run a phony "Trump University" that promised to make students rich but instead steered them into expensive and mostly useless seminars, and even failed to deliver promised apprenticeships.

headline.main: NY AG Sues Trump,' Trump University,' Claims Fraud
headline.print_headline: NY AG Sues Trump,' Trump University,' Claims Fraud
